issue.title: [C++][Compute] Make constexpr BooleanToNumber kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13824](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13824). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The **Call** method of the [BooleanToNumber](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/cpp/src/arrow/compute/kernels/scalar_cast_numeric.cc#L267) kernel can be simplified into a one-liner and made **constexpr**.
